alert.note: Alert for Noble; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:10AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Noble and northeastern Whitley Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 310 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ligonier, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ligonier, Albion, Churubusco, Swan, Cromwell, Ege, Green Center, Merriam, Blue Lake, Big Lake, Knapp Lake, Loon Lake, Collins, Ormas, Kimmel, Wolflake and Bear Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
